title: Understanding the Concept
text: To determine the sign of the system's entropy change, consider whether the system is becoming more or less ordered.

title: Evaluating the Process
text: When a volume of air is divided into separate components (nitrogen, oxygen, and argon), think about whether this separation increases or decreases the system's disorder.

title: Entropy Basics
text: Entropy (S) is a measure of the disorder or randomness in a system. Separating a mixture into pure substances typically decreases the entropy because it leads to a more ordered system.
